Class Debit

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
      • Debit

  • public class Debit
extends BankAccount
    This is the sub class of the Bank Account class. It is the account of the debit card. It will have a boolean state determined by the positive amount of money in the account
    Author:
    Harmanjit Randhawa

      • setAmount

        public void setAmount(int amount)
        This method is used to set the amount of money in the bank account
        Parameters:
        amount - It is the amount of money that would be available in the account

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        It withdraws an amount of money from the account
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount withdrawn from the account
        Returns:
        True if the transaction is complete else returns false

      • transaction

        public boolean transaction(int pinNumber,
                           double amount)
        This method withdraws the amount if the pin entered is correct
        Parameters:
        pinNumber - This is the pin entered by user
        amount - This is the amount to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        Returns true if the transaction is successful and returns false otherwise
